channel.title: W3Teal
channel.description: I am a frontend developer from North Sumatra, Indonesia who loves solving hard problems in a light way. I love F(L)OSS software, especially the light ones!

item.title: Are slashes worth it?
item.description: What is the importance of sharing light information with (/it, /this)?

item.title: I have rewritten this website.
item.description: Finding a SSG was a very difficult decision, so I created a new SSG (?!)

item.title: #100DaysToOffload
item.description: Every day is worth writing down, how about making it into a contest?

item.title: Blogging is a therapy for programmers
item.description: A good start must be with good hope!

item.title: Managing images through Cloudinary (and why I love it)
item.description: You don't always have to rely on Git to upload images!

item.title: Selecting my favorite fonts
item.description: A beautiful font from the default, no need to be tacky.

item.title: "Sekolah" obligations
item.description: Schools do not always know what is better

item.title: Windows 11 is never stable
item.description: Windows 11 has never had any stability in design or performance

item.title: Using Reprose as a CMS for writing with GitHub
item.description: You don't need a CMS if your posts are hosted on GitHub!

item.title: 3D
item.description: The easiest way to convey realtime things on the web

item.title: Me and proprietary software
item.description: Proud to use open source software, adore it but still proprietary software cannot be replaced

item.title: W3Teal & Fosstodon
item.description: Choosing an instance on Mastodon is hard, I really like Fosstodon because it has dev, web, and FOSS themes.

item.title: How to embed your Mastodon profile
item.description: In X (aka Twitter), you can easily embed your profile page via their official page. But, how you can do it in Mastodon?
